c74object.name: mx-square
c74object.description: mx-square squares a pattern according to the rules of distributive patterns, in accordance with Chapter 12 of Schillinger's book. A pattern of the form (a+b...+n)^2 is multiplied out, without summing the parts, so it becomes (a^2+ab...+an) + (ab+b^2...+bn)... + (am+bm...+m^2). Also, a synchronizing pattern is output, in the form sum(a+b...+n)*a + sum(a+b...+n)*b...+ sum(a+b...+n)*n.

method.name: pat
method.digest: Load pattern to be squared and output
